FuncDef:
The mpls oam ingress enable command enables MPLS OAM on the ingress of a specified LSP.
The undo mpls oam ingress enable command disables MPLS OAM on the ingress of a specified LSP. The configured MPLS OAM parameters remain after the command is run.
By default, MPLS OAM is disabled on the ingress of an LSP.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the tunnel type and number.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI] mpls oam ingress Tunnel 10 type ffd frequency 100
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable MPLS OAM parameters configured on the ingress to take effect, run the mpls oam ingress enable command.
